          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnesium reaction with sulphate solutions</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnesiumreaktion mit Sulfatlösungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Réaction de magnésium aux solutions de sulfate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reação do magnésio com soluções do sulphate</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reazione del magnesio con le soluzioni del 
solfato</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντίδραση μαγνήσιου με τις λύσεις θειικού άλατος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reacción del magnesio con las soluciones del 
sulfato</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a magnesium ribbon reacting with solutions of iron sulphate and copper sulphate.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">copper sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">iron sulphate</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnesium ribbon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reaction</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sulphate solution</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt ein Magnesiumfarbband, das 
mit Lösungen des Eisensulfats und des kupfernen Sulfats reagiert.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un ruban de magnésium 
réagissant avec des solutions de sulfate de fer et du sulfate de 
cuivre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra uma fita do magnésio que
reage com as soluções do sulphate do ferro e do sulphate de cobre.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un nastro del magnesio
che reagisce con le soluzioni del solfato del ferro e del solfato di 
rame.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει κορδέλλα μαγνήσιου που 
αντιδρά με τις λύσεις του θειικού άλατος σιδήρου και του θειικού
άλατος χαλκού.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra una cinta del magnesio 
que reacciona con las soluciones del sulfato del hierro y del sulfato 
de cobre.</string>
          </description>
